title: Ed Miliband – 2012 Speech to the National Policy Forum
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Ed Miliband, the Leader of the Opposition, to the National Policy Forum on 16th June 2012 in Birmingham.

[![edmiliband](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband-214x300.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband.jpg)
